text: The Merchant of Four Seasons () is a 1971 West German drama movie directed by Rainer Werner Fassbinder and starring Hans Hirschmüller, Irm Hermann, Ingrid Caven, Kurt Raab, Hanna Schygulla, Walter Sedlmayr, Klaus Löwitsch. It was distributed by Tango Film. ==Other websites== * Category:1971 drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Rainer Werner Fassbinder Category:Movies set in Bavaria Category:Movies set in Munich Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies set in the 1960s
title: The Merchant of Four Seasons
